````{r}
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)


set.seed(1234)
foo <- sample_n(train, 8e3)

leaflet(data = foo) %>% addProviderTiles("Esri.NatGeoWorldMap") %>%
  addCircleMarkers(~ pickup_longitude, ~pickup_latitude, radius = 1,
                   color = "blue", fillOpacity = 0.3)
````
